sentences.en: A glance along his bookshelves reveals a bewildering array of interests.
sentences.cn: 看一眼他的书架就知道他兴趣繁杂。

sentences.en: A warm tide of feeling, bewildering, frightening, swept over her.
sentences.cn: 立即有一股迷惘和惊恐的热烈情潮泛过她的全身.

sentences.en: As the deadline approached she experienced a bewildering array of emotions.
sentences.cn: 随着最后期限的临近，她开始心绪纷乱，不知所措。

sentences.en: I found the experience quite bewildering.
sentences.cn: 我觉得这次经历令人相当困惑.

sentences.en: It was quite bewildering, the whole process passed quite fast.
sentences.cn: 通道有点难绕, 有几次我们走错了方向又被叫了回来.

sentences.en: Now hosts of bewildering and confused ideas came crowding on his mind.
sentences.cn: 这时,无数纷乱而迷惘的印象一齐涌到他的脑海来.

sentences.en: Space exploration is at the same time a bewildering and exciting topic.
sentences.cn: 太空探索是既令人迷惑又令人兴奋的话题.

sentences.en: The brilliant career of the great French footballer Eric Cantona , and the unruly nature of his character, together present a bewildering picture.
sentences.cn: 出色的法国足球运动员埃里克·坎通纳的辉煌足球生涯和他那桀骜不驯的性格一起构成了一幅令人迷惑的画面.

sentences.en: The choice of excursions was bewildering.
sentences.cn: 各种各样可供选择的远足项目让人眼花缭乱。

sentences.en: The speed of change is rapid, the statistics bewildering.
sentences.cn: 变化速度之快, 令统计工作手足无措.

sentences.en: The styles change with bewildering rapidity.
sentences.cn: 风格多变,令人应接不暇.

sentences.en: Though not catastrophic, the drop in oxygen levels was bewildering.
sentences.cn: 尽管不是灾难性的, 但是氧气水平的下降仍使人感到迷乱.

sentences.en: Thus setting up a single sample plot in an area can produce some rather bewildering result.
sentences.cn: 因此,如果在某个地区内只在某单块抽样小区内采样,那末就可能得到某种较为含糊的结果.

sentences.en: With the new investors has come a bewildering variety of loans.
sentences.cn: 随着新投资者出现的,还有一系列让人眼花缭乱的贷款.

sentences.en: Within that field we have to face a somewhat bewildering complexity.
sentences.cn: 在这一领域内,我们必须面对一种颇令人困惑的复杂情况.

words.tran_cn: 令人困惑地；使人迷乱地

trans.tran_en: confusing, especially because there are too many choices or things happening at the same time
